thread.title: Young Dro & Stevie J Trade Shots on Instagram Over Joseline Hernandez
thread.title_full: Young Dro & Stevie J Trade Shots on Instagram Over Joseline Hernandez

author: Jessica Bennett
title: Young Dro & Stevie J Trade Shots on Instagram Over Joseline Hernandez
text:
February 21, 2017 by Jessica Bennett 0 Shares Advertisement 
Young Dro and Stevie J may have traded a few passive-aggressive jabs over Joseline Hernandez in the past, but it never spilled over into anything serious... until now. 

This weekend, the Atlanta rapper and Love & Hip Hop: Atlanta star went head to head on Instagram over the one woman they have in common. 
Joseline was rumored to have been pregnant by Dro until DNA testing confirmed Stevie J as the father of 2-month-old Bonnie Bella. 
Credit: Instagram 
Young Dro decided to call out Stevie for comments he made on Instagram, to which the producer responded by posting text messages he claims were between Dro and a transgender woman. 
A post shared by Baller Alert (@balleralert) on Feb 18, 2017 at 5:15pm PST 
The father of six also called out Dro for “trying to get hot” off his latest baby mama’s name. 

The “Shoulder Lean” rapper then uploaded a quote, reading “Real n—as don’t worry about other n—as.” 
His went on to call Stevie out by name, threatening to take things the physical route the next time they see each other. 
A post shared by Young Dro (@dropolo) on Feb 18, 2017 at 11:41am PST 
“Do u know how many people don’t pay attention to u ? I’m one of em!" he wrote. "U keep on reaching my boy u taking shots like u can’t get ate n—a your old ass food U can tell all your lies kick this internet s—t all u want to but Ima real street n—a [sic].” 
Credit: Instagram 
He continued, “I’m not gone play when I catch u in the jungle I’ll fye yo ass up and after u whoeva else can get it my boy. From the desk of Djuan Hart duck ass n—a #f—kwrongwitcha #Aintgotshit2dowitnanbitch. [sic]” 

Do you think these two will actually fight over Joseline? Sound off below.
